termination_clause.text: termination. 9.3 To remunerate HGF on the basis of thirty percent (30%) of net Company income basis on an annual basis commencing 12 months after the first full 12-month revenue period. 9.4 To purchase product from the Company at a price of cost plus five percent (5%). 9.5 To issue two (2) million NVOS common stock upon successful target of twenty-five million dollars ($25M) of net profit achieved by the Company each fiscal year. NVOS common stock will be delivered to HGF via Novo Healthnet Limited ("NHL") exchangeable preferred shares. All parties understand NVOS is a U.S. reporting publicly traded corporation and that any NVOS common shares issued, from exchanging the NHL exchangeable preferred shares, will be provided under the guiding U.S. rules and regulations.
